name: Dark Eye
description: The Dark Eye is a humanoid creature known for its manipulative and sinister nature, wearing a breastplate that enhances its defense.
memorable: Excels at dealing psychic damage and incapacitating foes, creating tension in combat with its Gaze of Shadows ability.
goals: To control and dominate opponents using manipulation and combat prowess.
relations: Related to other shadowy humanoids or creatures that thrive in darkness.
environment: Typically found in dark or shadowy locations, avoiding sunlight.
strengths: Possesses blindsight for perception and can avoid crowd control effects with Dark Devotion.
weaknesses: Has disadvantage on attack rolls and Perception checks in sunlight, making it vulnerable during the day.
attacks: Makes two dagger attacks, dealing piercing damage combined with cold damage.
most_powerful_ability: Gaze of Shadows allows it to incapacitate creatures, creating a psychological effect in combat.
equipment: Wields daggers for melee and ranged combat.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to perceive without relying on sight.
skills: Has proficiency in Perception, reflecting its keen awareness.
additional_information: Has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.
Can choose to avert its gaze to avoid its own abilities.
Effective at controlling the battlefield with psychic damage.
Relies on darkness and stealth for tactical advantage.
Moderate threat level, presenting opportunities for strategic encounters.
test_queries: humanoid that thrives in darkness and shadows
manipulative monster with gaze attack effects
psychic attacker that is weak in sunlight
dark creature with powerful incapacitating ability
